nodes.text: Boneyard was a factory city that was situated on the planet Nox, in the Tython system. The city was situated within a large factory dome and the air in the city was barely breathable as a result of discharges of industrial fumes. In 25,793 BBY, the fugitive darksiders Daegen Lok and Xesh journeyed to Boneyard after escaping from imprisonment on the moon Bogan and they constructed Forcesaber weapons for themselves within the city's Gratz Foundry.
